title: 2950 orange essences for my elementalist lux skin shard...
body:
even if i disenchant my other 13 skin shards  and add the essence to my 546 orange essences i already have i cant reach the 2950 for this skin.... wtf? :D
is there an other way to get them besides enchanting skin shards and opening boxes?

replies.body: Orange essence does primarily come from disenchanting skin shards, but sometimes you'll get some as a flat bonus from opening chests. That specific skin *IS* rather expensive to be completely honest, but that's one of only a few because they are ultimate skins.

You're out of luck I think. If you REALLY want that skin, then you should definitely hold onto that skin shard because you will eventually be able to get enough essence, and that skin is expensive as hell. However, if you don't want it that badly, you may be better off turning it into essence.
